title: Spatial distribution and potential ecological and health risks associated with heavy metals in the Ijero-Ekiti mining site, Nigeria
content:
Publication date: March 2024

Source: Regional Sustainability, Volume 5, Issue 1

Author(s): Johnson Adedeji OLUSOLA, Adeyinka Oluyemi ATURAMU, Olufunke ASAOLU, Olusesan Sola OGUNLEYE
